name: Cats with top hats
description:
demo available now

Play through this adventure game with a land run by cats. Play as a cat and explore a day to day life in a Cattopia, but don't get caught doing mischief. This game is a mix of chaos, anarchy, and CATS. Adventure through mystical lands, Meet local cats and cause mayhem.  

Demo info

the demo represents the first section of the game and will be continued to be updated to match the final game product 

Donations info

All donations are welcome and will help the development of this game. become a pateron  to get exclusive in game content, updates, and early access. read more about donations at:

https://www.patreon.com/CWTH

Post suggestions here:

https://www.reddit.com/search/?q=catswithtophats&source=recent
